Uses of Class
com.bluenile.scrabble.model.ScrabbleWord

Packages that use ScrabbleWord
Package Description
com.bluenile.scrabble.api

  • Uses of ScrabbleWord in com.bluenile.scrabble.api

    Methods in com.bluenile.scrabble.api that return types with arguments of type ScrabbleWord
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> ScrabbleController.getScrableWords​(java.lang.String inputString)
    Takes the inputString parameter and invokes the Service's getScrableWords() method to build a scored list of words creating by the characters contained in the inputString.

  • Uses of ScrabbleWord in com.bluenile.scrabble.dao

    Methods in com.bluenile.scrabble.dao that return types with arguments of type ScrabbleWord
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> ScrabbleDao.getWords​(java.lang.String inputWord)
    This method reads the words from the data source and returns a list of words that are equal or less length to input word length.
    java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> ScrabbleDaoText.getWords​(java.lang.String inputWord)
    The implementation of this method opens the file system text file, reads the file line by line and stores the line in the readWord variable then creates an unqualified ScrabbleWord object and sets the word property to readWord and initializes the score property at zero if:
    readWord length is greater than zero and
    readWord length is less than or equal to inputWord length.
    If the List already exists then it is cleared.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> ScrabbleService.getScrabbleWords​(java.lang.String inputWord)
